title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: My son, attend unto my wisdom, and bow thine ear to my understanding:
lineList.cn: 我儿，要留心我智慧的话语，侧耳听我聪明的言词。

lineList.en: That thou mayest regard discretion, and that thy lips may keep knowledge.
lineList.cn: 为要使你谨守谋略，嘴唇保存知识。

lineList.en: For the lips of a strange woman drop as an honeycomb, and her mouth is smoother than oil:
lineList.cn: 因为淫妇的嘴滴下蜂蜜，他的口比油更滑。

lineList.en: But her end is bitter as wormwood, sharp as a two-edged sword.
lineList.cn: 至终却苦似茵？？，快如两刃的刀。

lineList.en: Her feet go down to death; her steps take hold on hell.
lineList.cn: 他的脚，下入死地。他脚步，踏住阴间。

lineList.en: Lest thou shouldest ponder the path of life, her ways are moveable, that thou canst not know them.
lineList.cn: 以致他找不着生命平坦的道。他的路变迁不定，自己还不知道。

lineList.en: Hear me now therefore, O ye children, and depart not from the words of my mouth.
lineList.cn: 众子阿，现在要听从我，不可离弃我口中的话。

lineList.en: Remove thy way far from her, and come not nigh the door of her house:
lineList.cn: 你所行的道要离他远，不可就近他的房门。

lineList.en: Lest thou give thine honour unto others, and thy years unto the cruel:
lineList.cn: 恐怕将你的尊荣给别人，将你的岁月给残忍的人。

lineList.en: Lest strangers be filled with thy wealth; and thy labours be in the house of a stranger;
lineList.cn: 恐怕外人满得你的力量，你劳碌得来的，归入外人的家。

lineList.en: And thou mourn at the last, when thy flesh and thy body are consumed,
lineList.cn: 终久你皮肉和身体消毁，你就悲叹，

lineList.en: And say, How have I hated instruction, and my heart despised reproof;
lineList.cn: 说，我怎吗恨恶训诲，心中藐视责备，

lineList.en: And have not obeyed the voice of my teachers, nor inclined mine ear to them that instructed me!
lineList.cn: 也不听从我师父的话，又不侧耳听那教训我的人。

lineList.en: I was almost in all evil in the midst of the congregation and assembly.
lineList.cn: 我在圣会里，几乎落在诸般恶中。

lineList.en: Drink waters out of thine own cistern, and running waters out of thine own well.
lineList.cn: 你要喝自己池中的水，饮自己井里的活水。

lineList.en: Let thy fountains be dispersed abroad, and rivers of waters in the streets.
lineList.cn: 你的泉源岂可涨溢在外。你的河水岂可流在街上。

lineList.en: Let them be only thine own, and not strangers' with thee.
lineList.cn: 惟独归你一人，不可与外人同用。

lineList.en: Let thy fountain be blessed: and rejoice with the wife of thy youth.
lineList.cn: 要使你的泉源蒙福。要喜悦你幼年所娶的妻。

lineList.en: Let her be as the loving hind and pleasant roe; let her breasts satisfy thee at all times; and be thou ravished always with her love.
lineList.cn: 他如可爱的？？鹿，可喜的母鹿。愿他的胸怀，使你时时知足。他的爱情，使你常常恋慕。

lineList.en: And why wilt thou, my son, be ravished with a strange woman, and embrace the bosom of a stranger?
lineList.cn: 我儿，你为何恋慕淫妇，为何抱外女的胸怀。

lineList.en: For the ways of man are before the eyes of the LORD, and he pondereth all his goings.
lineList.cn: 因为人所行的道，都在耶和华眼前。他也修平人一切的路。

lineList.en: His own iniquities shall take the wicked himself, and he shall be holden with the cords of his sins.
lineList.cn: 恶人必被自己的罪孽捉住。他必被自己的罪恶如绳索缠绕。

lineList.en: He shall die without instruction; and in the greatness of his folly he shall go astray.
lineList.cn: 他因不受训诲，就必死亡。又因愚昧过甚，必走差了路。
